item.title: Trump's nominee for Export-Import Bank withdraws over Russia ties

item.title: 6 Attorneys Who Signed Arctic Frost Subpoenas Are No Longer At DOJ
item.description: All of the six attorneys who signed the subpoenas released Wednesday are no longer employed by the DOJ, The Federalist has learned.

item.title: A Time for Choosing on Antisemitism
item.description: Tucker Carlson’s friendly interview with Nick Fuentes makes it impossible to ignore the right’s festering antisemitism problem.

item.title: Exclusive: New Report Tracks $200 Million Spent On Illegal Immigrant Health Care
item.description: 'When elected officials argue that taxpayer dollars aren't going to illegal immigrants that just isn't true,' Open The Books CEO John Hart said.

item.title: Texas' Crockett inches toward Senate bid against Cornyn

item.title: Humility Revisited: On Being Conservative
item.description: Populists are as vulnerable to magical thinking as ideologized elites, and just as prone to rash action.

item.title: The Big Nothing
item.description: A House of Dynamite succeeds as a piece of exploratory journalism but fails as a drama.

item.title: NATO Member’s Top Court Considers Whether Saying Men And Women Are Different Is A War Crime
item.description: Finland's Supreme Court heard arguments Thursday about whether quoting the Bible is illegal 'hate speech' under its war crimes laws.

item.title: China’s ‘Fortress Without Isolation’
item.description: Beijing’s latest Five-Year Plan, while couched in familiar bureaucratic language, marks a significant evolution in the regime’s grand strategy.

item.title: The Times Does Republican Jack Ciattarelli a Favor
item.description: Is it MAGA to want plastic bags back?

item.title: AG Jason Miyares' surge in polls offers GOP hope in Virginia
item.description: Virginia Attorney General Jason Miyares' reelection campaign is closing strong.

item.title: VA Dems Use Special Session To Pull Sears Off Campaign Trail, Taking A Page From Trump Lawfare Playbook
item.description: It's reminiscent of when Donald Trump was kept from campaigning in 2024 because Democrats tied him up in court.
